text: ara amara abasya'i pratyeka jatira madhye eka-eka jana rasula damra karechi e'i bale -- ''allah‌ra upasana kara ebam tagutake barjana kara.’’ Sutaram tadera madhye katakajana ache yadera allah satpathe paricalita karechena, ara tadera madhyera kataka ache yadera upare pathabhranti'i samicina hayeche. Sejan'ye prthibite tomara bhramana kara ebam dekhe na'o kemana hayechila pratyakhyanakaridera parinama.
